query:
INSERT INTO absence (absent_teacher_lesson, absence_date)
        SELECT $1, COALESCE($2::timestamp, CURRENT_DATE)::date
        WHERE EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM lesson le
            JOIN teacher t ON le.teacher_id = t.id
            JOIN import i ON t.import_id = i.id
            WHERE le.id = $1 AND i.user_id = $3
        )
